title: 246 - ISHIWI LIMO FYE ILYA KWA YESU

lines: NOW JUST A WORD FOR JESUS
1. Natumfwe shiwi lya Yesu Cibusa obe,
Tumfwe kuli Yes'i-shiwi. Litwafwe mu nshila;
Shiwi lyakwa Yesu limo, Imba upepe.
2. Tumfwe Shiwi lya Yesu, Ne fyo akwelela;
Mu cikuku tulesha kufika ku mulu.
4. Tumfwe Shiwi lya Yesu, Twilapose nshita,
5. Tumfwe Shiwi lya Yesu, Kusho busumino.
Fuma mu kunaka, Fyonse pela ku Mfumu.
